definition: abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]
to print/to publish/publication/periodical/to peel with a knife/to carve/to amend

sentences.english: More than three quarters of the information on the internet is in English too!
sentences.chinese: 世界書刊雜誌的四分之三都是用英文撰寫的。

sentences.english: The Free Library System (FLS) is a system for maintaining a database of items and borrowers of a library.
sentences.chinese: 是一個用來維護圖書館書刊條目和讀者數據庫的系統。

sentences.english: The layout of books and periodicals is essential to the binding design.
sentences.chinese: 書刊的版面設計，是裝幀設計的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Diarmuid: Second-hand and antiquarian books, and sheet music; they have something for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 他們還有舊書和古物古玩類的書刊和各種樂譜。

sentences.english: Check that children have brought books for class or rent books for class.
sentences.chinese: 檢查學生是否帶書刊號或租書給孩子。

sentences.english: The staining and losing of the books and periodicals are the common phenomena in university library.
sentences.chinese: 書刊污損與流失是高校圖書館普遍存在的現象。

sentences.english: FLS - The Free Library System (FLS) is a system for maintaining a database of items and borrowers of a library.
sentences.chinese: 是一個用來維護圖書館書刊條目和讀者數據庫的系統。

sentences.english: They both worked for a famous picture magazine.
sentences.chinese: 兩個別同在一個有名的書刊雜誌社作事。

sentences.english: She decided she wanted to write a book about her experiences at the magazine.
sentences.chinese: 她決定寫一本描述她在書刊雜誌社工作時的經過。

sentences.english: Read English books or magazines that you enjoy and that aren't too challenging.
sentences.chinese: 讀一些你喜歡的書刊雜誌，不要太難。

sentences.english: While reading English books or magazines.
sentences.chinese: 在讀英語書刊和雜誌時。

sentences.english: One day I was browsing through the library.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我正在圖書館裏瀏覽書刊。

sentences.english: They then share their findings and experiences through conferences and publications in medical journals.
sentences.chinese: 他們會通過商討和醫學雜誌的書刊分享他們的發現。
黃色書刊毒害年輕人的心靈。

sentences.english: Users will be able to read books, newspapers, and magazines in portrait and landscape orientation.
sentences.chinese: 用戶將能以橫向和縱向兩種形式閱讀書刊和報紙雜誌。

sentences.english: I have sold a lot of old books and back numbers.
sentences.chinese: 好多過期的書刊雜誌我都賣了。

definition: Siku Quanshu (collection of books compiled during Qing dynasty)
